comments.body:
This is essentially the only change in this PR.

in `tensorflow/compiler/xla/service/platform_util.cc` `CanonicalPlatformName`
will ultimately replace `gpu`  by eiter `cuda` (like before) or `rocm` if we are compiling with `TENSORFLOW_USE_ROCM`
Seems reasonable to me. (I sort of wish the design just gave them different names and allowed them to be linked simultaneously, but that's not today's problem.)
